Inseminate animals 6-12 hours after standing heat is first observed.
Insemination following observed estrus up to time point prescribed in schedule, followed by Fixed Time insemination of animals not previously detected in heat
A single, mass insemination of all animals.  No heat detection used.

Split-time AI = two insemination points used.  Use a heat detection aid to identify estrous females and inseminate only estrous females at the first time point.  Remaining females are Fixed Time inseminated 20 to 24 hours later.
